current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit the National Labor Relations
		  Board from taking any action that requires a quorum of the members of the Board
		  until such time as Board constituting a quorum shall have been confirmed by the
		  Senate, the Supreme Court issues a decision on the constitutionality of the
		  appointments to the Board made in January 2012, or the adjournment sine die of
		  the first session of the 113th Congress.
